summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2774 for the improvement of East Fir Street, from Twentieth Avenue to Fifteenth Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by grading, curbing, constructing concrete sidewalks, together with all necessary crosswalks, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 33219, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
